content.rendered:
SPACIOUS RENTAL HOMES, FEATURING THE LATEST DESIGN TRENDS AND MODERN FINISHES, RAISING THE BAR!

The Villas at Waterfall is the final precinct of luxury residential homes to be launched at Waterfall Estates. Located on the apex of the estate, these homes were designed to provide spectacular views of their surrounds and overlook the entire development. Featuring the latest design trends and imported finishes, these units have large windows and provide ample natural light that flows through the open plan living spaces. The terraced entertainment area has a swimming pool and provides the perfect platform to enjoy sundowners. The Villas consist of 190 units in a choice of 6 different unit layouts (3 and 4-bed options) ranging from 310m² to 401m².

Contact Darren
Contact Desireé
BROCHURE
ESTATE RULES
MEET THE NEIGHBOURS
ESTATE LOCATION

ESTATE FEATURES

3 and 4 bedroom houses available for rent
Sizes range from 330m² – 401m²
Rent from R33,500pm – R47,700pm
Scenic views from every home
Modern open plan layouts with opulent finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Close proximity to retail centres
Care-free living as maintenance is included

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails/Paths
Mountain Bike Trails
Unrivalled Lifestyle Facilities
Children’s Play Park
Access to Waterfall’s main Clubhouse with Gym
Some Homes Have Their Own Swimming Pools

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

THE VILLAS WATERFALL ARE ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
